developer: I have years of experience in topics from web development to artificial intelligence. I'm particularly excited by the prospect of developing projects in the medical, music, and education fields.
mentor: Helping others is important to me. In addition to official tutoring, I often help classmates with coding, calculus, physics, and other schoolwork. I'm always willing to lend a hand if you're struggling with something.
artist: Though CS is my main jig, I'm also a musician and performer. I have a creative side and an eye for design, which can often inspire me. It's also an outlet for me to stay balanced and well-rounded.
